name: Sky Harrier: Alpha Code
description:
You are part of an elite force of pilots who must take to the skies and defend planet earth from alien invaders and those that have taken arms along side them.
The task you face is not an easy one, but difficulty must be overcome if humanity is to survive, we’re counting on you pilot, all of us.
God speed pilots, God speed!




20 Colorful Levels,
22 Enemy Types,
3 Boss Battles,
Full Gamepad Support,
Steam Achievements.
